ðŸ“– Summary: Vince is a self-hosted web analytics solution designed as a privacy-friendly alternative to Google Analytics. It offers features like automatic TLS, drop-in replacement for Plausible Analytics scripts, and comprehensive tracking capabilities, all within a single, dependency-free binary. Vince prioritizes ease of use and data ownership, making it suitable for users seeking control over their analytics data.
